name: Archer Princess
description:
Story

Archer Princess is a fast-paced 3rd-person momentum-based navigation game, where you as a master archer princess are trying to get to the castle in the air as fast as possible, to rescue your captured brother, while dealing with manipulated guards keeping you away.

Gameplay

Navigate through the castle using your slide and wall jumping abilities, and fight off enemies with your trusty bow. Track your time if you enjoy setting new personal records and more!

Controls
